grounded-nebula-408412.twitter_analysis_.name: 02_political_hashtags_count
grounded-nebula-408412.twitter_analysis_.description: Aggregated statistics about hashtag usage in political contexts, focusing on hashtags used by at least one politician. Includes usage metrics and temporal data.

row_id.name: row_id
row_id.description: Unique identifier for each row in the table.

month_start.name: month_start
month_start.description: First day of the month for which metrics are calculated.

node_id.name: node_id
node_id.description: Twitter user ID serving as the node identifier in the network.

pagerank.name: pagerank
pagerank.description: PageRank score indicating the node's importance in the migration discussion network.

degree_in.name: degree_in
degree_in.description: Number of incoming connections in migration-related discussions.

degree_out.name: degree_out
degree_out.description: Number of outgoing connections in migration-related discussions.

betweenness.name: betweenness
betweenness.description: Betweenness centrality in the migration discussion subnetwork.

clustering.name: clustering
clustering.description: Clustering coefficient within the migration discussion subnetwork.

triangles.name: triangles
triangles.description: Count of triangles in the migration discussion subnetwork that include this node.

core_number.name: core_number
core_number.description: K-core number in the migration discussion subnetwork.

interactions_sent.name: interactions_sent
interactions_sent.description: Number of migration-related interactions sent by this node.

interactions_received.name: interactions_received
interactions_received.description: Number of migration-related interactions received by this node.

interactions_total.name: interactions_total
interactions_total.description: Total migration-related interactions this node was involved in.

toxicity_sent.name: toxicity_sent
toxicity_sent.description: Total toxicity score of migration-related interactions sent by this node.

toxicity_received.name: toxicity_received
toxicity_received.description: Total toxicity score of migration-related interactions received by this node.

toxicity_sent_avg.name: toxicity_sent_avg
toxicity_sent_avg.description: Average toxicity score of migration-related interactions sent by this node.

toxicity_received_avg.name: toxicity_received_avg
toxicity_received_avg.description: Average toxicity score of migration-related interactions received by this node.

grounded-nebula-408412.base_twitter_pyth.name: network_network_metrics_climate
grounded-nebula-408412.base_twitter_pyth.description: Network-level metrics for the climate discussion network, including density, modularity, and other global network properties.

row_id.name: row_id
row_id.description: Unique identifier for each row in the table.

month_start.name: month_start
month_start.description: First day of the month for which metrics are calculated.

table_name.name: table_name
table_name.description: Name of the table representing the network.

nodes.name: nodes
nodes.description: Total number of nodes in the network.

edges.name: edges
edges.description: Total number of edges in the network.

density.name: density
density.description: Network density (ratio of actual to possible connections).

connected_components.name: connected_components
connected_components.description: Number of connected components in the network.

transitivity.name: transitivity
transitivity.description: Global transitivity/clustering coefficient of the network.

modularity.name: modularity
modularity.description: Modularity score indicating community structure strength.

modularity_classes.name: modularity_classes
modularity_classes.description: Number of communities detected in the network.

assortativity.name: assortativity
assortativity.description: Degree assortativity coefficient of the network.

network_avg_toxicity.name: network_avg_toxicity
network_avg_toxicity.description: Average toxicity score across all interactions in the network.

median_node_toxicity.name: median_node_toxicity
median_node_toxicity.description: Median toxicity score of nodes in the network.

max_core_number.name: max_core_number
max_core_number.description: Maximum k-core number found in the network.

avg_core_number.name: avg_core_number
avg_core_number.description: Average k-core number across all nodes.

rich_club_coefficient.name: rich_club_coefficient
rich_club_coefficient.description: Rich-club coefficient measuring connectivity among high-degree nodes.

average_clustering.name: average_clustering
average_clustering.description: Average clustering coefficient across all nodes.

grounded-nebula-408412.base_twitter_pyth.name: tweet_sentiment_analysis
grounded-nebula-408412.base_twitter_pyth.description: Table containing sentiment and toxicity analysis predictions for tweets,  along with associated probabilities and timestamps.

user_id.name: user_id
user_id.description: ID of the user who posted the tweet.

recorded_at.name: recorded_at
recorded_at.description: Timestamp when the tweet was recorded.

sentiment.name: sentiment
sentiment.description: Sentiment classification of the tweet (positive, neutral, negative).

positive_probability.name: positive_probability
positive_probability.description: Probability score for the tweet being classified as positive.

neutral_probability.name: neutral_probability
neutral_probability.description: Probability score for the tweet being classified as neutral.

negative_probability.name: negative_probability
negative_probability.description: Probability score for the tweet being classified as negative.

toxicity_label.name: toxicity_label
toxicity_label.description: Label indicating whether the tweet is toxic or neutral.

toxicity_score.name: toxicity_score
toxicity_score.description: Score indicating the degree of toxicity in the tweet.

grounded-nebula-408412.base_twitter_raw..name: raw_zenodo
grounded-nebula-408412.base_twitter_raw..description: Raw Twitter data containing tweets, user information, and interactions between 2020-2021 for German and English tweets.

twista.name: twista
twista.description: Version of the Twista tool used for data collection.

type.name: type
type.description: Type of entry (retweet, reply, quote, user, status).

id.name: id
id.description: Unique identifier for the tweet or user.

user.name: user
user.description: User ID associated with the entry.

created_at.name: created_at
created_at.description: Timestamp of when the tweet was created.

recorded_at.name: recorded_at
recorded_at.description: Timestamp of when the tweet was recorded by Twista (scraper model).

source.name: source
source.description: Source application or tool used to post the tweet.

hashtags.name: hashtags
hashtags.description: List of hashtags used in the tweet.

urls.name: urls
urls.description: List of URLs used in the tweet.

mentioned_ids.name: mentioned_ids
mentioned_ids.description: User IDs of the mentioned users.

refers_to.name: refers_to
refers_to.description: ID of the tweet to which it refers (in replies, retweets, or quotes).

description.name: description
description.description: The user-defined description of the profile.

url.name: url
url.description: URL provided by the user in their profile.

verified.name: verified
verified.description: Boolean indicating whether the user is verified.

friends.name: friends
friends.description: Number of accounts the user is following.

listed.name: listed
listed.description: Number of public lists that this user is a member of.

statuses.name: statuses
statuses.description: Number of tweets (including retweets) issued by the user.

grounded-nebula-408412.base_twitter_raw..name: ext_epi_netz_de
grounded-nebula-408412.base_twitter_raw..description: External data mapping German politicians to their Twitter accounts with additional metadata from the EPI network dataset.

user_id.name: user_id
user_id.description: Unique Twitter user ID of the politician.

official_name.name: official_name
official_name.description: Official full name of the politician.

party.name: party
party.description: Political party affiliation of the politician.

region.name: region
region.description: Geographic region represented by the politician.

office.name: office
office.description: Political office held by the politician.

twitter_handle.name: twitter_handle
twitter_handle.description: The politician's Twitter username in lowercase.

abgeordnetenwatch_id.name: abgeordnetenwatch_id
abgeordnetenwatch_id.description: Unique ID from the abgeordnetenwatch.de platform.

wikidata_id.name: wikidata_id
wikidata_id.description: Wikidata entity ID for the politician.

grounded-nebula-408412.base_twitter_raw..name: hashtag_categorisation
grounded-nebula-408412.base_twitter_raw..description: Table containing categorized hashtag usage, including engagement statistics, political relevance, and confidence scores.

usage_count.name: usage_count
usage_count.description: The total number of times the hashtag was used.

unique_users.name: unique_users
unique_users.description: The number of unique users who used the hashtag.

politician_users.name: politician_users
politician_users.description: The number of politicians who used the hashtag.

first_used_at.name: first_used_at
first_used_at.description: The timestamp when the hashtag was first used.

last_used_at.name: last_used_at
last_used_at.description: The timestamp when the hashtag was last used.

pct_political_users.name: pct_political_users
pct_political_users.description: The percentage of users who are politicians.

days_active.name: days_active
days_active.description: The number of days between the first and last use of the hashtag.

categories.name: categories
categories.description: The assigned categories for the hashtag, separated by semicolons (`;`).

confidence.name: confidence
confidence.description: Confidence score (0-1) indicating the reliability of the categorization.
